programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Kõigele põnevale, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal iseenda või sõpradega ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! Vaata meid esmaspäevast neljapäevani kas kell 16.45 või 18.45. Meie saatejuhtidele ja reporteritele saad oma ideid, soove ja küllakutseid saata e-posti nova@err.ee. Noortemagasini toimetavad Laura Kõrvits ja Lota Viik, režissöörid Kristo Veinberg ja Maarja Pärsim.(n)

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Marko Reikop ja Grete Lõbu.(n)

programme.title: Ellujäämisheitlus
programme.desc: Mustjalg-tuhkur elab Põhja-Ameerikas ja toitub peamiselt rohtlahaukuritest. Kuna Euroopast pärit kolonistid pidasid rohtlahaukureid kahjuriteks, hävitasid nad neid närilisi ning see tõi kaasa ka mustjalg-tuhkru väljasuremise äärele sattumise. 1979. aastal peetigi liiki väljasurnuks, kuid kaks aastat hiljem leiti Wyomingis 18 looma, kelle baasil hakati seda liiki paljundamisega taastama. 90ndatel aastatel hakati mustjalg-tuhkruid taas loodusesse laskma. Bioloog Travis Livieri aitab haruldasel loomal looduses uuesti kanda kinnitada.(n)

programme.title: Eesti lipp ümber Islandi
programme.desc: Oleme jõudnud Põhja-Islandi pealinna Akureyrisse, kus oma tegemistest räägib 19 aastat Islandil elanud Valmar. Kuidas lõpevad katsed esimese islandi rahvustoiduga ehk pahaks lastud hailihaga? Paneme jala maha Islandi ristiusu hällis. Millega tegeleb Myvatnis eestlane Margus? Sarja autor Lemo. Tootja Hüperborea Liikuvad Pildid / Tootmisguru OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Kallis kodu
programme.desc: On lõikusaeg. Steph rassib tööd teha, aga aega napib ja teda ähvardab oht farmist ilma jääda. Sarah satub ohtlikku olukorda. Teresa peab vastu võtma tähtsa otsuse. Uustulnuk põhjustab Sarah’ ja Francese vahel hõõrumist. Alison avastab langevarjuõnnetuste tõelise põhjuse. Kas ta jõuab Francest õigeaegselt hoiatada?(n)

programme.title: Planeedipäästjad
programme.desc: Pakendivaba elu praktiseeriva Karini koju kolivad sisse uued töökad abilised. Taaraveoga karastunud Kalle harjutab igapäevaste käikude tegemist jalgrattaga. Kõike seda ikka planeedi päästmise üllal eesmärgil. Saatejuht Kadi Jaanisoo-Kuld, režissöör Märten Vaher, toimetaja Marit Ummelas, produtsent Egle Beek.(n)

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: "Plekktrummi" stuudios süttivad tuled, et jätkata vestlusi inimestega, kes on ennast pühendanud kultuuri kujundamisele ja mõtestamisele. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma.(n)

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Xand ja Chris asutavad oma raadio GAGA, vaatavad üle ühe karvasevõitu loo ja proovivad tabada kõrgeid noote. EMO-s on väike Chris, kes tõmbas talendisaadet mängides käe lõhki.(n)

programme.title: Beni ja Holly väike kuningriik
programme.desc: Preili Küpsise õpilased on väikeses kuningriigis loodusretkel ja kõik peidavad end suurte inimeste eest.(n)

programme.title: Oktonaudid
programme.desc: Kui kõik gupid kaduma lähevad, tuleb kaptenil ja Kwaziil purikaladega kihutada, et need tagasi saada.(n)

programme.title: Nöps ja Mikk
programme.desc: Miku kartulist valmistatud templid kaovad ja kuriteos süüdistatakse Karvast Kartulikrahmajat. Mägedesse teda otsima minnes leitakse aga eest sügavad hanged ja Nöps peab taas oma leidlikkust kasutama, et sõbrad ei vajuks kohevasse lumme.(n)

programme.title: Priit ja Prääks
programme.desc: Priit aitab Lillehaldjat, kes täidab tema soovi – saada osa suurest seiklusest – ja muudab ta väikeseks. Nüüd peab Priit tegema kõik, et haldjas uuesti üles leida ja paluda end endiseks muuta.(n)

programme.title: Ernest ja Celestine
programme.desc: Ernest kohtub ühe oma ammuse sõbraga, kes kutsub teda endaga kaasa ringreisile. Ernest kibeleb minema, aga mis saaks siis Celestine'ist?(n)

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Al, Bob ja Fred sokutavad end mereröövlilaevale, et aardekaart kätte saada. Laev võtab suuna Kollase Lohe saarele, kuhu on maetud vana Jimi varandus.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Väike Printsess nuputab, mida vaprat korda saata, et teenida endale välja uhke läikiv medal nagu Peaministril.(n)

programme.title: Kroonitud peakesed
programme.desc: Tsaaritaridel keelatakse ära igasugune võlumine, kuna on 13. kuupäev ja reede, aga tüdrukud otsustavad salaja ennustada.(n)

programme.title: Hommiku-Hannes
programme.desc: Täna tuleb Hannesel rinda pista kahe jumalusega iidses Hiina palees.(n)

programme.title: Saara ja part
programme.desc: Saara saab esmapilgul toreda kaaslase, ent selgub, et too võib teha ka palju pahandust.(n)

programme.title: Mängime arsti
programme.desc: "Mängime arsti!" on vahva ja hariv minisari 6-9-aastastele lastele, milles selgitatakse lihtsal ja näitlikul viisil enamlevinud haiguste olemust ning sümptomite avaldumisvorme.(n)

programme.title: Lastekirjandusministeerium
programme.desc: Lastekirjandusministeeriumis töötavad minister Piip ja minister Tuut. Neil on oma kabinet Toompeal, mis meenutab veidi raamatukogu. Kahe peale on ka üks ministriportfell, mille sees on suur ja paks raamat väärtuslike salakoodidega. Nende abil leiavad Piip ja Tuut riiulist just õige raamatu, mida lugeda ning vaatajaile tutvustada. Seekord kohtume kirjanik Anti Saarega, kes kirjutas raamatu "Kuidas minust ei saanud kirjanikku", pildid tegi Hillar Mets. Režissöör Kristo Veinberg, mängivad Haide Männamäe ja Toomas Tross.(n)

programme.title: Boa vanaema
Babuška udava
programme.desc: Lustakas lugu nelja sõbra - jutuka Pärdiku, tagasihoidliku Elevandipoja, ekstsentrilise Papagoi ja mõtliku Boa ettevõtmistest koduses džunglis, kus tihtilugu tuleb lahendada naljakaid paradokse, mis on seotud mitmetähenduslike sõnamängudega. Tallinnfilmile tõlkinud Valeeria Villandi, režissöör Eugen Rozental, näitlejad Ellu Puudist, Harry Gustavson, Olaf Paesüld, Ain Jürisson ja Jaanus Orgulas.(n)

programme.title: Ujumise lühiraja EM
programme.desc: EM-i 4. võistluspäeval selguvad medalivõitjad naiste 200 m rinnuliujumises. Loodame, et Eneli Jefimova edukas aasta jätkub veel ühe finaalujumisega Euroopa tipptasemel. Finalistid selguvad meeste 50 m liblikujumises. Eelmisel lühiraja EM-il saavutas Daniel Zaitsev 4. koha.(n)

programme.title: Ellujäämisheitlus
programme.desc: Dugongid on lamantiinidega suguluses olevad mereimetajad. Kunagi oli neid kõigis ookeanides, kuid nüüd leidub neid ainult Austraalia ranniku lähedal, mõnedes India ookeani ja Vaikse ookeani lääneosa väikestes piirkondades. Mosambiigi ranniku lähedal Bazaruto saarestiku rahvuspargis elab umbes 200 häbelikku, kuid õpihimulist dugongi, keda kohalikud kalurid on sajandeid püüdnud, sest enamik toidust pärines merest. Nüüd on dugongide püüdmine rangelt keelatud, kuid neid ohustavad kalavõrgud. Kuna nad on imetajad, käivad nad iga kuue minuti järel pinnal hingamas. Kohalike vaesus aitab kaasa salaküttimisele. Koolides püütakse suurendada teadlikkust sealse floora ja fauna osas, sest dugongid saavad ellu jääda vaid siis, kui rahvuspargi püüdlusi toetavad ka paikkonna elanikud.(n)

programme.title: Putin - Vene spiooni lugu
programme.desc: Vladimir Putin naaseb pärast nelja-aastast vaheaega võimule, kuid katsed tõsta oma populaarsust takerduvad korruptsioonisüüdistuste taha. Sarja viimases osas vaadeldakse, kuidas peegelduvad Putini teadmised spioonitegevusest tema Venemaa juhtimise viisis ja kuidas on isiklikud kogemused mõjutanud tema poliitikat.(n)

programme.title: Ajalugu viie minutiga
The fall of the Berlin Wall, 1989
4x4. Türgi
programme.desc: Sarja seitsmendas osas algab suur lõimumine ja kohalike oludega tutvumine. Piilume karjuseelu telgitagustesse ja naudime külalislahkust. Seejärel sõidame Kayseri nimelisse linna ja vaatame ringi kohalikul hiigelsuurel turul. Siis jõuame aga imeilusasse Kapadookiasse. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Filmiklubi
programme.desc: Sissejuhatus kinoklassika filmile "Zorro mask".(n)

programme.title: Zorro mask
The Mask of Zorro
programme.desc: Seiklusmärulis näeme koguni kahte musta maski taha varjunud mõõgaga vehkivat ja piitsa plaksutavat Zorrot, kes võitleb alati ülekohtu ja türannide vastu. Verivaenlane Montero on tapnud Anthony Hopkinsi kehastatud vana Zorro naise, röövinud tema tütre ja mehe enda 20 aastaks vangikongi heitnud. Kui Zorrol viimaks põgeneda õnnestub, õpetab ta vehklejana ja hiilgava ratsanikuna välja oma mantlipärija (Antonio Banderas), kes hakkab Montero jälgi ajama. Tuleb välja, et kaunitariks sirgunud Elena (Catherine Zeta-Jones) on Montero poolt lapsendatud ja peab meest oma isaks.(n)

programme.title: Sõda
En guerre
programme.desc: R: Stéphane Brizé. Sotsiaalne draama nn väikeste inimeste võitlusest oma koha ja elu eest kapitalistlikus süsteemis. Kui suur, 1100 töötajaga Prantsuse tehas Saksa tööstusgrupiga liitus, lubati tehase töötajatele, et järgmise viie aasta jooksul nende töökohad säilivad. Kaks aastat hiljem otsustavad juhid ettevõtte sulgeda. Protesteerivate töötajate kõneisikuks saab Laurent Amadeo (Vincent Lindon) ja vastasseis viib vältimatute kokkupõrgeteni. Kuldse Palmioksa nominatsioon Cannes´is.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Printsess saab teada, kas papagoi eest hoolitsemine on kerge või raske töö.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Printsess õpib, et alati ei pea sõitma pikale reisile, vaid koduümbruseski võib palju huvitavat avastada.(n)

programme.title: Beni ja Holly väike kuningriik
programme.desc: Mereröövel Punahabe läheb kadunud linna otsima. Peagi tuleb kogu seltskonnal teda aianduskeskusest päästma minna.(n)

programme.title: Tipsi ja Tim
programme.desc: Ema viib kaksikud koolimajja, et nad näeksid kooli, kus peagi käima hakkavad, ja tutvuksid oma õpetajaga.(n)

programme.title: Hommiku-Hannes
programme.desc: Täna on Hannes ihukaitsja, ta peab turvama üht isevärki ulakat tegelast.(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Saarat ja Miiat üllatab kinnisvaraagent, kes on tulnud Luciana kutsel Polettide maad ostma. Saara tõmbub kurvalt oma tuppa ja Miia suundub Tsentoopiasse. Seekordne ennustus viib haldjatest sõbrad sohu, kus nad kohtuvad soohaldja Lolaga, kes ei ole aga sugugi abivalmis ega lihtsa loomuga.(n)

programme.title: Maagilised kangelased
Die Wolf-Gäng
programme.desc: Vampiir, kes ei talu verd silmaotsaski; haldjas, kes kardab lennata ja libahunt, kellel on loomakarvade allergia – teismelised Vlad, Faye ning Wolf on seetõttu maailmakuulsa nõiakooli, Penneri Akadeemia, naerualused. Kuid kolmik hoiab kokku ja nimetab end Wolfi Kambaks, et koos paljastada salajane vandenõu, mida hauvad linnapea ning tema sekretär, mis tähendaks lõppu Crailsfeldeni linnale ja selle haldjatest, nõidadest, trollidest, kääbustest ning vampiiridest elanikkonnale. Fantastilises seikluses teevad kaasa tipp-koomikud Rick Kavanian ja Axel Stein. Saksamaa ühe edukama fantastika- ja ulmekirjaniku Wolfgang Hohlbeini raamatu filmiversioon.(n)

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Tänases osas uurime koos Chrisi ja Xandiga lähemalt, mis otstarve on higistamisel, ja teeme tutvust geeniteraapiaga.(n)

programme.title: Venemaa metsik loodus
programme.desc: Kaugel Venemaa avarustes asub kaks maa embuses asuvat veekogu. Idas voolav Volga viib oma veed Kaspia mere kallasteni, kus targad loomad on leiutanud nutikaid viise petlikus Eedenis ellujäämiseks. Baikali järv on suure osa aastast jääkaane all, sest Siberi talv ei halasta. Siinsetes vetes elab maakera ainus mageveehüljes ja kallastel leidub muidki omapäraseid loomi.(n)

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: Kuidas mõjutavad meie igapäevased valikud maailma ja milline on nende tegemata jätmise hind? "Plekktrummi" külaliseks on kirjanik Viivi Luik. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma. Täna on Viivi Luigel 75. sünnipäev. Palju õnne!(n)

programme.title: Tähelaev
programme.desc: Tema särav hääl on kuulajaid rõõmustanud ja võlunud juba enam kui pool sajandit. Unustamatud rollid Estonia ja Vanemuise lavadel on Margarita Voitese nime kirjutanud Eesti muusika primadonnade leheküljele. Saatejuht Urmas Vaino, režissöör Kalev Lepik.(n)

programme.title: Lucia
programme.desc: Lucia aaria G. Donizetti ooperist "Lucia de Lammermoor" esitab Margarita Voites.(n)

programme.title: Laulab Margarita Voites
programme.desc: Margarita Voites esitab valiku oma repertuaari paremikust. Klaveril Aino Himbek.(n)

programme.title: Laulab NSVL rahvakunstnik Margarita Voites
programme.desc: Margarita Voites stseenides ooperitest G. Donzetti "Lucia de Lammermoor", E. Tambergi "Cyrano de Bergerac" jt, partneriteks Urve Tauts ning Teo Maiste. Lavapartnerid kõnelevad teatri elust ja võlust, ühisest loometööst. Kammerkontserdil esitab Margarita Voites soololaulu, flöödil Sigrid Orusaar, klaveril Therese Raide. Küsitles Enn Eesmaa.(n)

programme.title: Teatridirektor
programme.desc: W. A. Mozarti lühiooper "Teatridirektor" esietendus 1981. aastal Estonias, peaosades Anu Kaal ja Margarita Voites. Ooperi võtmepunktiks on kahe daami - preili Silberklangi ja proua Herzi - äge duell primadonna koha pärast. Filmis esitab reporter Enn Eesmaa intrigeerivaid küsimusi mõlemale Estonia primadonnale. Kaastegevad Hans Miilberg ja Tiit Tralla, lisaks Katrin Karisma, Helgi Sallo, Sirje Puura, Karl Kalkun, Arvo Laid. Teatri orkestrit dirigeeris Vello Pähn. Režissöör Mati Põldre.(n)

programme.title: Pärlipeegeldused. Laulab Margarita Voites
Pärlipeegeldused. Margarita Voites
programme.desc: Katkendeid lavastustest esitavad Margarita Voites, Hendrik Krumm, Ivo Kuusk ja Estonia ooperikoor. Lavastaja Neeme Kuningas, režissöör Toomas Lasmann, toimetaja Eeva Potter.(n)

programme.title: Joanna Lumley - Rongiga Aasiast Euroopasse
programme.desc: Sarja "Täitsa hullud" staar Joanna Lumley asub 9500 kilomeetri pikkusele teekonnale Hongkongist läbi Pekingi Moskvasse. Hongkongis veetis ta osa oma lapsepõlvest ja saab võrrelda, mis on muutunud. Pekingis kohtub ta naisega, kes väidab, et oli viimase Hiina keisri lemmikkonkubiin. Sealt jätkub teekond mööda Siberi raudteed. Joanna külastab Hiina müüri ja sõidab läbi Gobi kõrbe Mongooliasse.(n)

programme.title: Kodutänava piraadid
De piraten van hiernaast
programme.desc: Elu ontlikus rannalinnas pööratakse pea peale, kui sinna saabub elama perekond Blunderbuss – pesuehtne piraatide kamp, koos kõige selle juurde kuuluvaga, nagu mõõgavõitlused, silmaklapid, koduks olev piraadilaev, lemmikloomast kaheksajalg ja papagoi ning lõputu rummirüüpamine. Linnakese lugupeetud elanikud on uutest naabritest ja nende elukommetest päris kohkunud, kuid Michael saab piraatide perepoeg Billy’ga peagi heaks sõbraks. Uutel sõpradel seisavad ees põnevad aardejahid ning ohtlikud seiklused, mis viivad nad vastamisi maailma kõige hirmuäratavama mereröövli Cornelius Konkskäega, kuid tõeline piraat ei tunne hirmu millegi ees!(n)

programme.title: Buratino tegutseb jälle
62. Kotlette oodates
programme.desc: Lugu sellest, kuidas aeg voolab ja voolab. Malvina valmistatavate kotlettide ootel löövad aega surnuks Artemon ja Pierrot ning tutvuvad sunnitult Herta Berta Hermestiinega. Uut naabrinaist mängib Kadri Lepp, Malvina - Maria Soomets, Artemon - Karol Kuntsel, Pierrot - Anti Reinthal, lood kirjutas Wimberg, produtsent Margus Saar.(n)

programme.title: Lastekirjandusministeerium
programme.desc: Lastekirjandusministeeriumis töötavad minister Piip ja minister Tuut. Neil on oma kabinet Toompeal, mis meenutab veidi raamatukogu. Kahe peale on ka üks ministriportfell, mille sees on suur ja paks raamat väärtuslike salakoodidega. Nende abil leiavad Piip ja Tuut riiulist just õige raamatu, mida lugeda ning vaatajaile tutvustada. Seekord kohtume kirjanik Anti Saarega, kes kirjutas raamatu "Kuidas minust ei saanud kirjanikku", pildid tegi Hillar Mets. Režissöör Kristo Veinberg, mängivad Haide Männamäe ja Toomas Tross.(n)

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Keset pimedat talve on alaskalased silmitsi raskustega ja peavad tegema raskeid otsuseid. Jessie Holmes osaleb teist korda Iditarodil, kuid juba tuttavate toimingute asemel seisavad ees ootamatud väljakutsed. Andy Bassich ja Denise Backer peavad Yukoni jõel jäämüürist läbi murdma.(n)

programme.title: Viis koostisosa – Jamie kiired ja lihtsad road
programme.desc: Täna valmistab Jamie aromaatset lambakarrit, kõrvitsa-harissasalatit, peent krevetipastat roosa veiniga ja mõnusalt lihtsaid kaerapätsikesi.(n)

programme.title: Loomade salaelu
programme.desc: Kuldsed lehestikukonnad Pablo ja Maria peavad kindlasti paarituma, muidu nende Chesteri sugu ei jätku. Ent Pablol puudub Maria vastu huvi ja kaks aastat pole uusi kulleseid koorunud. Šimpanside juures käib juhtemase koha pärast võimuvõitlus ning äsja saabunud Vila on tõsine troonipretendent. Okassigadel on sündinud poeg, ent 11 surikaadi kõrval elada pole niisama lihtne. Kui ta viimaks julguse kokku võtab, ootavad teda ootamatud seiklused. Aasia taapirid kolivad. Noore Solo jaoks on see närvesööv ettevõtmine, ent ema on alati toeks.(n)

programme.title: 4x4. Türgi
programme.desc: Sarja kaheksandas osas vaatame ringi Kapadookia piirkonna põnevates linnakestes, külastame ühte mäe sisse uuristatud lossi ja naudime kuumaõhupallide lendu. Seejärel satume taas keelatud alale ja piilume vabanemise järel veidrasse soolajärve. Lõpuks pannakse meid ühel offroad-võistlusel tööle. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Ema
programme.desc: Kelly ja Jason on varahommikul üleval, valmistutakse puhkusereisiks. Michaelil on olnud kohutav öö ja ta tahab Cathyle midagi rääkida.(n)

programme.title: Suurte heliloojate klassikalised paigad
programme.desc: Iga suure isiksuse kujundab ka miljöö, kus ta sündis, üles kasvas ja tegutses. Ludwig van Beethoven veetis suurema osa elust keiserlikus maailmalinnas Viinis, kuid oli sündinud väikeses provintsilinnas Bonnis. Varajane kurtus hävitas noore virtuoosi esitajakarjääri, kuid ta hiilgavad saavutused heliloomingus muutsid muusikamaailma igaveseks.(n)

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: Following the mysterious death of the British Prime Minister, Secret Agent Mike Banning does all he can to stop the planned attack, targeting to assassinate all western world leaders attending the funeral.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.

programme.title: The Expendables 2
programme.desc: The Expendables go on a mission presumed to be fairly easy, but it is far from. They face plenty of difficulties that result in a death, which lights a desire for revenge in their hearts from a killer who has enough platinum to change the power structure of the entire world.

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: When FBI agent Johnny Utah is sent undercover to infiltrate a gang of bank robbers who are also surfers, his sense of duty gets blurred as he befriends the gang's leader Bodhi and catches feelings for a female surfer called Tyler.

programme.title: The Words
programme.desc: An ambitious writer achieves fame when he pens the next great American novel. His secret? The story isn't his. He soon realizes the cost of his success is much higher than expected when he has to live up to his plagiarism.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: As Buddy, brought up as an elf, comes to realize that he is a human being, not an elf, he embarks on a perilous journey to New York City in order to find his real father.

programme.title: Hugo
programme.desc: In 1930's Paris, orphaned Hugo lives in a crowded train station. He enters a new adventure with Isabelle, in an attempt to solve the mystery his father has left behind regarding an automaton.

programme.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
programme.desc: Mikael Blomkvist is a journalist who is hired by Mr. Vanger in order to reveal the secret of his niece's murder, almost forty years ago,whose body was never found. Thus Blomkvist resorts to young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander to help him reveal the mystery.(c)

programme.title: Broken City
programme.desc: In a broken city full of injustice and corruption, when an ex-cop is betrayed, he seeks to exact revenge on the city's most notorious public figure, Nicholas Hostetler, in an attempt to get his salvation.(c)

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: A deceased CIA agent's skills are implanted in a convict called Jerico Stewart , with a dangerous profile and a highly unpredictable behavior.(c)

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: An elite hitman is successful working in the shadows. Now he's teaching his trade to an apprentice who is related to one of his previous victims.

programme.title: Hugo
programme.desc: In 1930's Paris, orphaned Hugo lives in a crowded train station. He enters a new adventure with Isabelle, in an attempt to solve the mystery his father has left behind regarding an automaton.(c)

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: As Buddy, brought up as an elf, comes to realize that he is a human being, not an elf, he embarks on a perilous journey to New York City in order to find his real father.(n)

programme.title: The Lincoln Lawyer
programme.desc: A famous lawyer, Mickey Haller, defends complex criminal cases in Los Angeles. Mickey runs the business his own way in his Lincoln, which tells that his business made him rich. Haller finds himself involved in the defense of the son of a wealthy businessman “Louis Roulet”, accused for rape and murder. A major conflict makes Haller not convinced of his client’s innocence. The lawyer turns into the investigator and opposes many influential persons’ attempts to mislead justice.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: After his arrest with the help of Newt Scamander, Grindelwald manages to escape from the grip of the Magical Congress of the United States of America and sets out to gather his followers. Albus Dumbledore decides to enlist Scamander in order to defeat this upcoming danger.(n)

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: Lawyer Lucy Kelson works as a legal counsel for the billionaire playboy George Wade. But when she grows tired of being his indispensable aide, she submits her resignation, yet has to find him a replacement.(n)

programme.title: The Big Wedding
programme.desc: A long-divorced dysfunctional pair have to fake being married for the duration of their adoptive son's wedding. Gathered under the same roof, family madness ensues.(n)

programme.title: Where the Wild Things Are
programme.desc: Max is a young boy with an active imagination, when an accident happens to his sister Claire and her friends, he runs away dressed as a wolf in an imaginary world. Living with animals in the forest ,he meets Carol, who is very much like Max,he proclaims himself a king and magically fix their problems.(n)

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: A grumpy Grinch leading a solitary life with his dog is annoyed when the neighboring city of Whoville decides to throw brighter, larger, and more cheerful celebrations. He hatches a scheme to ruin their festivities, but his nefarious plan collides with a cheerful plan of a cheerful young girl.(n)

programme.title: August: Osage County
programme.desc: The strong-willed women of the Weston family find themselves heading back to their childhood Oklahoma house, and the eccentric woman who raised them, following a family crisis. The events reveal many aspects of this family and the problems facing the women and their mother.(n)

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: Howard Inlet, a successful New York advertising executive, suffers a great tragedy and retreats from his social life. While his concerned friends try desperately to reconnect with him, he seeks answers from the universe by writing letters to Love, Time and Death. But it's not until his notes bring unexpected responses from three unique visitors that he begins to understand how these three constants interlock in a life fully lived, and how even the deepest loss can reveal moments of meaning and beauty.(n)

programme.title: Manchester by the Sea
programme.desc: Lee Chandler is forced to go back to his hometown in Manchester when his brother, Joe, passes away after a long struggle with illness. Lee finds himself obligated to take care of Patrick, his nephew, and become his guardian until he turns eighteen.(n)

programme.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
programme.desc: Mikael Blomkvist is a journalist who is hired by Mr. Vanger in order to reveal the secret of his niece's murder, almost forty years ago,whose body was never found. Thus Blomkvist resorts to young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander to help him reveal the mystery.(n)

programme.title: Europa Report
programme.desc: A Sci-fi ,adventure about a global team of astronauts going on a privately funded mission to Europa to search for life on Jupiter's biggest moon, but many unexpected surprises await them on this strange and wondrous moon.

programme.title: Tomorrowland
programme.desc: Using a magic button, Casey Newton (Britt Robertson) enters a mysterious hidden land , taking her on an adventure to meet the isolated inventor Frank Walker (George Clooney) whoho entered it before. Together Casey and Frank travel to this land for the second time.

programme.title: The Death and Life of Bobby Z
programme.desc: Tim Kearny was spending his prison sentence until a DEA agent offers him a way out. He needs to impersonate Bobby Z, a recently deceased drug dealer, in a hostage switch with a crime lord. The negotiations don't go very well, complicating everybody's calculations.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: When a heist goes south and ends in blood, Jimmy takes his adoptive brother Eli and goes on the run from a vengeful criminal. The brothers stumble into more trouble when young Jimmy uses a mysterious weapon to save his brother, attracting the attention of both the FBI and otherworldly figures.

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: The 11-year-old Anna Fitzgerald enlists the help of a lawyer to earn medical release from her parents, who want her to donate her kidney to save the life of her elder sister Kate who has leukemia.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: After becoming an outcast following the aftermath of Harvey Dent's death, Bruce Wayne's resumes his role as the caped crusader who must defend Gotham City from Bane's plan of nuclear destruction.

programme.title: The Lookout
programme.desc: Once a school athlete, Chris tries to turn over a new leaf as he gets a job as a janitor at a bank. As he attempts to turn his life around and enjoy a normal existence, things go awry when he finds himself accused of planning a grand heist.

programme.title: Celeste and Jesse Forever
programme.desc: Best-friends-turned-married couple Celeste and Jesse married young. They begin to drift apart as they grow up until Celeste decides that getting a divorce is better for them. Hoping to preserve their friendship, Celeste has second thoughts when Jesse starts getting serious with another woman.

programme.title: New Year's Eve
programme.desc: A romantic comedy that follows the love stories of a group of people in New York City on New Year's Eve. On said night, love, betrayal, forgiveness, and second chances are put on the table.

programme.title: Midnight Sun
programme.desc: Katie, an attractive 17-year-old girl who has a health issue has been confined to her house during the day by a rare disease that makes even the smallest amount of sunlight deadly. Fate intervenes when she meets Charlie and they embark on a summer romance.

programme.title: Terminal
programme.desc: Set in a train terminal at night, two assassins with a sinister mission, a fatally ill teacher, an enigmatic janitor, and a waitress with a double life meet. Murderous consequences unravel as their lives intersect at the hands of a criminal mastermind hell-bent on revenge.(c)

programme.title: Downsizing
programme.desc: Paul and Audrey Safranek are a married couple who live in Omaha. Paul (played by Matt Damon) is a good-natured occupational therapist whose wife dreams of having a bigger house. Upon meeting their friends Dave and Carol Johnson who have downsized into 5 inches height, they learned that downsizing would increase the value of their assets by a 100 folds and will also reduce human waste and thus save the planet. After agreeing to downsize, Audrey backs out in the last moment and Paul realises that his problems will be getting bigger as he got smaller.(c)

programme.title: New Year's Eve
programme.desc: A romantic comedy that follows the love stories of a group of people in New York City on New Year's Eve. On said night, love, betrayal, forgiveness, and second chances are put on the table.(c)

programme.title: Stuck in Love
programme.desc: An acclaimed writer struggles with getting over his ex-wife, and raising his teenaged children, as they all try to grapple with the complicated thing called love.(c)

programme.title: Midnight Sun
programme.desc: Katie, an attractive 17-year-old girl who has a health issue has been confined to her house during the day by a rare disease that makes even the smallest amount of sunlight deadly. Fate intervenes when she meets Charlie and they embark on a summer romance.(c)

programme.title: Celeste and Jesse Forever
programme.desc: Best-friends-turned-married couple Celeste and Jesse married young. They begin to drift apart as they grow up until Celeste decides that getting a divorce is better for them. Hoping to preserve their friendship, Celeste has second thoughts when Jesse starts getting serious with another woman.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: Dangerous criminal Richard B. Riddick (Diesel) is being transported to prison in a cargo spacecraft. When the spaceship is damaged by comet debris and makes an emergency crash landing on an empty desert planet, Riddick escapes. However, when predatory alien creatures begin attacking the survivors, Riddick joins forces with the crew to develop a plan to escape the planet.(n)

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: The movie chronicles the ill-fated Apollo 13 mission on the moon. Three astronauts, Lovell, Haise and Swigert, were supposed to be on Apollo 14, but instead they find themselves in jeopardy on Apollo 13.(n)

programme.title: Downsizing
programme.desc: Paul and Audrey Safranek are a married couple who live in Omaha. Paul (played by Matt Damon) is a good-natured occupational therapist whose wife dreams of having a bigger house. Upon meeting their friends Dave and Carol Johnson who have downsized into 5 inches height, they learned that downsizing would increase the value of their assets by a 100 folds and will also reduce human waste and thus save the planet. After agreeing to downsize, Audrey backs out in the last moment and Paul realises that his problems will be getting bigger as he got smaller.(n)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon
programme.desc: The suicidal detective Martin Riggs gets parented with officer Roger Murtaugh who is his complete opposite. As they investigate a drug-trafficking ring, they have to learn to work together to catch the gang.(n)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2
programme.desc: LAPD police officers Riggs and Murtaugh are tracking down South African smugglers who use their diplomatic immunity as a shield. But when they're assigned to protect Leo Getz, who's testifying in a big case, he leads them to the same criminal operation.(n)

programme.title: Homefront
programme.desc: A former DEA agent moves with his daughter to a small town, only to be confronted with the local Meth drug lord. When his daughter becomes at risk, he stops at nothing to protect her.(n)

programme.title: The Next Three Days
programme.desc: After his wife is accused of murder, John Brennan (Russell Crowe) decides to break his wife out of jail. He plots out every single detail it would take to pull off such an arduous task, including meeting with the author of a book detailing the numerous times he managed to escape from prison (Liam Neeson).(n)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Marinette Dupain-Cheng is a shy high-school student who inherited magical ladybug-shaped earrings which gives her powers and transforms her to Ladybug. She learns to deal with new responsibilities and protect the city of Paris from evil.(n)

programme.desc: Four mutant turtle brothers fight crimes and go on dangerous adventures. But their latest adventure has them tapping into something mysterious.(n)

programme.title: Saw VI
programme.desc: As the Jigsaw successor Mark Hoffman continues to carry on his legacy, he sets a game into motion as the FBI tries to track him down.

programme.title: الفيلم الوثائقي Marvel's Behind The Mask
The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a last ditch effort to stop Memnon from taking over the world, the leaders of the remaining free tribes hire the assassin Mathayus to kill Cassandra, whom Menmon depends on to foretell his great victoies.

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: When a CIA agent is killed in a mission gone south, the agency recruits his previously-unknown identical twin brother, a street hustler, to take his place. A veteran agent is entrusted with his training and with convincing him to take on the dangerous mission.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: The L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team (S.W.A.T.) is charged with securing and escorting criminal Alex Montell, who is a foreign mafia leader wanted by the Interpol. Alex is offering a $ 100 million reward for anyone who can break him out of police custody.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Frankenstein's monster becomes involved in an ancient war between two immortal clans of demons and gargoyles.

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: When the lives of his wife and child are put in danger by a bloodthirsty sultan, prince Vlad risks his soul to save them.

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: Before the events of Star Episode IV - A New Hope, and after the founding of the Galactic Empire, a group of rebels planned to carry out a very difficult task, which is to steal the charts of the Star of Death, a deadly weapon with high destructive power, which is owned by the empire.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
programme.desc: As he attempts to rescue Princess Leia from Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker teams up with Han Solo and two droids to find the princess and destroy a powerful weapon made by the Galactic Empire.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
programme.desc: As the Imperial fleet launches an attack on the Rebel Alliance base in Hoth, the spirit of Obi-Wan Kenobi sends Luke Skywalker to train under Yoda.

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: Now that a cure is found to treat mutations, X-Men are divided between Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a league of mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.(c)

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: Nick Wild is a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal professional skills and a personal gambling problem. When a friend is beaten by a sadistic thug, Nick strikes back, only to find out the thug is the son of a powerful mob boss, dragging Nick into the criminal underworld.(c)

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: In the border stretching between Mexico and the U.S.A, an area that has been always out of the reach of law, an idealistic FBI agent is assigned to aid in the escalating war against the cartel.(c)

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead
programme.desc: An overworked paramedic begins to hallucinate over a three-night shift. As he is haunted by the ghosts of those he failed to save, he must fight to hold onto his sanity.(c)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
programme.desc: As the rebels rescue Han Solo and set out to destroy the second Death Star, Luke Skywalker tries to find a way to bring his father back from the dark side.(c)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Jedi Knights Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi escape an aggressive attack during their quest for allies, and on their journey they come across the young boy, Anakin Skywalker, in whom they see a great talent that can restore balance to the Force.(c)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
programme.desc: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padmé Amidala despite the age gap. The Republic is mired in chaos and it is discovered that there is a secret clone army posing a threat to the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: Reign of Fire
programme.desc: After a hibernating dragon is awakened from the earth burning everything, the remaining survivors live in a refortified castle where the fire chief, Quinn, tries to protect them from the menacing beasts. Until an American called Van Zan arrives, claiming to have found a way to kill the dragon.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: Now that a cure is found to treat mutations, X-Men are divided between Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a league of mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: As Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker are sent to help Palpatine against Count Dooku, Anakin turns more to the Force as he struggles against visions of the death of his beloved wife Padmé, until he is lured to the dark side and Darth Vader is born.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A seventh installment to the series, with events taking place thirty years after the Battle of Endor and the events portrayed in Return of the Jedi.(n)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: After the trials and tribulations faced by our heroes in the Age of Ultron, a new kind of challenge Government agencies aim to control the Avengers' every decision and action. This time, Captain America stands on one side of the fence, and Iron Man , on the other side.(n)

programme.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
programme.desc: A look into the backstory of Logan, focusing on his relationship with his brother Victor, the duo's recruitment by William Stryker, and Logan's departure from the mutant mercenary squad. As he tries to live a normal life with his girlfriend, Logan's past comes calling and puts his life on the line.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Japanese animated high-tech film, a special ops human-cyborg hybrid called The Major leads Section 9, which is an elite task force team. Devoted to stopping the most dangerous criminals and extremists, Section 9 is faced with an enemy whose singular goal is to wipe out Hanka Robotic's advancements in cyber technology.(n)

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: In the not so distant future Remy and Jake are two men assigned a grizzly task. Their job is to repossess artificial organs owned by their company when the organs’ holders fail to keep up with their payments. The duo carry out their missions with ruthless efficiency and without regard to human compassion. Things take a strange turn though when Remy finds himself in that same position.(n)

programme.title: Man of Tai Chi
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves’ directorial debut centers on the spiritual journey of a talented young martial artist whose skills draw him into the world of underground fight clubs.(n)

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: At the end of WWII, the desperate Nazis summon a creature from the depth of Hell to serve as a Nazi weapon. When US forces seize the half-blooded demon, Professor Trevor Bruttenholm takes him in and raises him to be a part of an elite supernatural team that defends the world against forces of evil.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: As Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker are sent to help Palpatine against Count Dooku, Anakin turns more to the Force as he struggles against visions of the death of his beloved wife Padmé, until he is lured to the dark side and Darth Vader is born.(n)

Captain America: Civil War

As he tries to live a normal life with his girlfriend, Logan's past comes calling and puts his life on the line.(n)

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: Princess Pei Pei is kidnapped from the Forbidden City, and Chon Wang decides to join the guards to rescue the princess. He teams up with a train robber, and they start a series of adventures together.(n)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Chon Wang is the sheriff of Carson City, Nevada, and his father is the Keeper of the Imperial Seal of China. When his father is murdered, Chon asks his friend Roy to go to London with him, with revenge on their minds.(n)

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: An evil dwarf penetrates the world between humans and mythical creatures, who declare war against the human race. A secret mission is planned to release the Golden Army, that is made up of a great number of strange and vicious creatures. Hellboy and his team are summoned to stop them and save humanity.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: In 1963, friends with supernatural powers (Charles Xavier) and (Erik Lensherr), known as Prof. X and Magento, worked together to find all individuals with supernatural abilities but the two sides soon split, splitting their followers into two warring teams.(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Marcus Burnett (Martin Lawrence), the quite family man and Mike Lowrey (Will Smith), the reckless ladies man are Miami policemen who are assigned to recover a $100 million drugug shipment before it gets distributed and they have only 72 hours to do it.(n)

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: John Wick (Keanu Reeves) a former professional assassin,whose peaceful life is disturbed when a thief breaks into his house, steals his car, and kills his dog. He seeks revenge on this thief, and discovers that his father is a Russian gang leader, who sets a reward for those who kill John.(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the near future, a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes. Captain John Anderton, an officer from that unit, is himself accused of a future murder that will happen in the next 36 hours. What makes the situation worse, is that Anderton doesn't even know the victim.(n)

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A mission to protect a young woman from an evil gang turns into something more when Special Forces agent Lin learns that his missing daughter has become the recipient of a bio-chemical invention, sending him on a quest that uncovers a wider conspiracy.(n)

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: Princess Pei Pei is kidnapped from the Forbidden City, and Chon Wang decides to join the guards to rescue the princess. He teams up with a train robber, and they start a series of adventures together.(n)

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: Jim Bennett is a literature professor who's suffering from a gambling addiction, which gets him in muddy waters with a group of gangsters.(n)

programme.title: Puerto Ricans in Paris
programme.desc: Luis and Eddie are detectives in the New York Police Department Luxury Goods Recovery Unit who are hired by a French designer to find her stolen purse designs. As their investigation takes them to Paris, Lusi and Eddie start to grow suspicious of everyone.(n)

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: Jim Bennett is a literature professor who's suffering from a gambling addiction, which gets him in muddy waters with a group of gangsters.(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Sam and Molly's romance comes to a brutal end when Sam gets killed on the street by a thug. Left behind in spirit form, Sam enlists the help of a psychic to protect Molly from his former partner and the danger he poses to her.(n)

programme.title: How To Lose A Guy In 10 Days
programme.desc: Journalist Andie Anderson specializes in writing topics of interest to women, but she wants to write about other things. She makes a deal with her boss that she would be free to write what she wants if she can write an article about what girls do wrong to spoil their relationship with guys.(n)

programme.title: Between Waves
programme.desc: Rick Gray returns to his coastal hometown, hoping that a return to his roots will help to reinvigorate him and combat his midlife crisis. As he reconnects with the friends of his youth, he embarks on a journey that will see him reevaluate his life and confront his choices.

programme.title: Some Like It Hot
programme.desc: Desperate to leave town after they witness a murder by the mafia, Joe and Jerry dress up as women to join an all-female band on the way to a job in Florida. But as Joe falls for one of the band's singers, Jerry finds himself the object of affection of a millionaire who is unaware of Jerry's truth.

programme.title: Jobs
programme.desc: The extraordinary story of Steve Jobs: from college dropout to Apple founder, entrepreneur, and creator of one of the most widespread devices of the 21st century, the iPhone.

programme.title: Crypto
programme.desc: Following a demotion, a Wall Street banker manages to find clues that unravel a global conspiracy. As he dives into the layers of corruption taking over New York, he soon finds his career, his life, and his family in peril.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: The film revolves around the arrival of seven armed men, from the Old West to a remote village, in order to help its people, in their fight against an evil gang trying take advantage of the village and the people.

programme.title: Throw Momma from the Train
programme.desc: Miserable literature teacher and author Larry and his no-less-miserable student Owen make a bizarre deal; Larry is to kill Owen’s overbearing mother, whereas Owen is to kill Larry’s evil ex-wife.

programme.title: A Dog's Breakfast
programme.desc: Patrick is a single man who lives with his dog Mars. When his sister visits to introduce him to her TV star fiancé, things spiral out of control when Patrick thinks that he might've killed him by mistake.

programme.title: The Guardian
programme.desc: Jake is a high school swim champion with a troubled past, is under training to be a coast guard at an elite school. His mentor is the legendary Ben Randall, who puts the arrogant Jake under pressure with situations that teach him about life.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Sent for a loathed assignment in the town of Punxsutawney, a self-centered weatherman finds himself stuck in a time loop as he relives the town's annual Groundhog Day festivities over and over again.

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: The journey of Cuban immigrant Tony Montana as he climbs his way to the top of the drug empire in 1980 Miami, and his subsequent crash as his ego and enemies cause his empire to crumble down.(c)

programme.title: Blame It on Rio
programme.desc: The friendship of two longtime friends, Matthew and Victor, is put to the test when a vacation in Rio de Janeiro leaves Matthew entangled in an affair with Victor's young daughter, Jennifer.(c)

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: Napoleon Dynamite is a socially awkward teenager who lives with his grandma and unemployed older brother in Preston, Idaho. He sets out to help his friend, Pedro, win the class presidency while dealing with his insane family at home.(c)

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: Truman, an employee of the insurance company, lives a normal life, in which the same situations are repeated on a daily basis. Despite his quiet life with his beautiful wife, Truman always feels something is missing. Truman wants to travel and roam the world, but obstacles always stand in his way. Truman is one of America's most famous people, but he certainly does not know it.(c)

programme.title: The Boy, the Dog and the Clown
programme.desc: After the loss of his father, the grieving Adrien meets a clown who teaches him magical tricks. But when Adrien gets lost in the woods, magic becomes his only way to be rescued.(n)

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: A step-father finds himself threatened by fierce competition when his step-children's father, who is way more cool than him, shows up suddenly.(n)

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: The life of an unemployed family living in a poor apartment changes completely when the son becomes the English tutor for the daughter of a wealthy family. As the lives of the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim family intersect, what follows is a web of deceit and disturbing violence.(n)

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: As the high school student Scott Howard struggles to fit in, his life takes a surprising turn when he finds out that he's a werewolf. But as he starts to become popular at school, he has to deal with his unusual nature.(n)

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: Bliss Cavendar is a misfit teenager from Texas who struggles with her mother who wants her to win beauty pageants. But when Bliss comes across members of a roller derby team, she discovers her true passion as she joins them in a women's roller derby championship.(n)

programme.title: The Pink Panther 2
programme.desc: Inspector Jacques Clouseau (Steve Martin) returns after solving the mystery of the Pink Panther Diamond, his angry boss Dreyfus tries to keep him in minor cases, but the rare diamond is stolen again with other artifacts around the world. A team of the greatest detectives is formed to retrieve these things and Clouseau is among them.(n)

programme.title: Larry Crowne
programme.desc: Middle-aged Larry Crown loses his job, and decides that he wants to start over and go back to college. He meets Mercedes, his professor, who leads a disappointing life with her husband. Fate brings them together, and Larry finally begins to fall in love with life again.(n)

programme.title: Henry's Crime
programme.desc: An innocent highway tollbooth worker is convicted of a bank heist, and decides to take the fall for a crime he did not do. While in jail, his formerly pathless life is altered when he meets his cellmate Max, a con man with whom he plans to rob a bank upon his release.(n)

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: Ryan Bingham is a man with a very odd job. He travels to offices across the United States in order to execute layoffs. His job has him travelling most of the time and he has found a comfortable life for himself. However, Natalie Keener, a rapidly-rising young co-worker at Ryan’s head office, threatens to throw his world off balance by proposing that firing should be done through the internet.(n)

programme.title: The English Patient
programme.desc: At the close of WWII, a Canadian nurse stays behind as her medical unit moves on to care for a burned and amnesiac man. As he starts to slowly regain his memory, an intelligence officer accuses him of cooperating with the Germans.(n)

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: A group of African Americans are opening their own private airline as a very lucrative venture from their point of view, but they have a lot of funny paradoxes, and undesirable things when they add some extra passengers on their first Flight.(n)

programme.title: There's No Place Like Home
programme.desc: As Alba and Pietro, an ageing couple who live on an island, invite their family to celebrate their 50th wedding anniversary with them, bad weather prevents everyone from leaving, whereupon disputes arise among the family.(n)

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: As the high school student Scott Howard struggles to fit in, his life takes a surprising turn when he finds out that he's a werewolf. But as he starts to become popular at school, he has to deal with his unusual nature.(n)

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: Bliss Cavendar is a misfit teenager from Texas who struggles with her mother who wants her to win beauty pageants. But when Bliss comes across members of a roller derby team, she discovers her true passion as she joins them in a women's roller derby championship.(n)

programme.title: The Pink Panther 2
programme.desc: Inspector Jacques Clouseau (Steve Martin) returns after solving the mystery of the Pink Panther Diamond, his angry boss Dreyfus tries to keep him in minor cases, but the rare diamond is stolen again with other artifacts around the world. A team of the greatest detectives is formed to retrieve these things and Clouseau is among them.(n)

programme.title: Larry Crowne
programme.desc: Middle-aged Larry Crown loses his job, and decides that he wants to start over and go back to college. He meets Mercedes, his professor, who leads a disappointing life with her husband. Fate brings them together, and Larry finally begins to fall in love with life again.(n)

programme.title: Henry's Crime
programme.desc: An innocent highway tollbooth worker is convicted of a bank heist, and decides to take the fall for a crime he did not do. While in jail, his formerly pathless life is altered when he meets his cellmate Max, a con man with whom he plans to rob a bank upon his release.(n)

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: When her family is threatened by Vladimir Lenin, Anastasia Romanova escapes through a magic portal that takes her to the year 1988, where she becomes friends with an American girl.(n)

programme.title: The Big Year
programme.desc: As a competition for who spots the highest number of birds looms closer, two bird-watching enthusiasts seek to unseat the record holder. But as real life beckons each of them, each embarks on an adventure that takes him far and near to observe the birds.(n)

programme.title: The Birthday Wish
programme.desc: When Gwen's plans to get engaged on her 30th birthday fall through, she makes a wish to be able to see into the future. But instead of offering answers, her glimpse into the future sends her into a tailspin as it raises questions about whether she is with the right man.(n)

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: A barbershop in Chicago is a place where plenty of interesting situations happen between the customers and the hairdressers at the barbershop, where each have their own dreams that they strive to reach in many different ways.(n)

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: The friendship and faith of a priest and a rabbi are tested when they both fall for an old friend. As both men struggle between upholding their duties and following their hearts.(n)

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: This picture is a drama about the founding of the popular social network website “Facebook”. After breaking up with his girlfriend, Mark has the idea to create a website where Harvard students can rate the attractiveness of females at the school. Eventually, he launches a website with his friend Eduardo that allows people to look up their friends without violating privacy.(n)

programme.title: Mississippi Burning
programme.desc: In 1964, racism continues to cast a shadow over America. Three civil rights defenders disappear in Mississippi. Two FBI agents go to the town to look into this mysterious case. Robert Anderson, worked in the region before joining the FBI, is well aware of the nature of the place, so he does not mind bending rules to achieve his goal. Events escalate and attacks on black citizens begin.(n)

programme.title: Public Enemies
programme.desc: A biopic that chronicles the FBI hunt of the infamous thief John Dillinger and two of his known associates, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd.(n)

programme.title: سباى هارد
Spy Hard
programme.desc: General Rancor plans to destroy the world with his missile hidden in a secret base, he kidnaps the scientist Prof. Ukrinsky who has a special computer chip that would complete his goal. Special Agent Dick Steele along with Ukrinsky's daughter are assigned to stop him and save the world.(n)

programme.title: Paper Spiders
programme.desc: In the wake of losing her husband, Dawn experiences growing anxiety after she learns that her daughter, Melanie, is moving away for college, after which Melanie attempts to help her mother with her paranoid delusions that threaten to jeopardize their loving bond.

programme.title: A Dash of Love
programme.desc: When landing a job at her idol's restaurant doesn't turn out to be the dream Nikki thought it would, she embarks on a new journey with her idol's executive chef, who was unfairly fired alongside her, to open an eatery and develop new recipes that challenge her celebrity idol's own reign.

programme.title: Beirut Blast: The Story Of Warehouse 12
The High Note
programme.desc: A famous singer and her hardworking assistant try to make a difficult choice, which could change the course of their careers forever.

programme.title: The Lost Husband
programme.desc: After her husband dies, Libby is forced to move in with her kids to her aunt's farm in Texas, where she struggles to adapt to a new life and get over her pain.

programme.title: Light of My Life
programme.desc: The journey of a father and daughter, through a society that is dying after an epidemic has killed half the world's population, especially women, and through a series of events that test the human personality, the father seeks to protect his daughter and maintain their friendship.

When a systems engineer reveals information about dangerous technology, the angels must face this threat.(c)

programme.title: Wander Darkly
programme.desc: After going through a traumatic accident, the couple Adrienne and Matteo find themselves experiencing a surreal state of being, where they have to confront their past before dealing with their uncertain future.(c)

programme.title: Paydirt
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, a parolee goes back to his old ways as he reunites his old crew to recover money that was stolen during a botched DEA raid. However, they have to work to evade the retired sheriff pursuing them.(c)

programme.title: Only
programme.desc: With the world's female population dying out due to a mysterious virus, Eva and her boyfriend struggle to survive in a torn world, trying to evade infection and hostile survivors.(c)

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of Fred Rogers, the presenter of 'Mister Rogers Neighborhood' program, which is one of the most popular children's programs, and his friendship with journalist Lloyd Vogel who was sent to do a story about him.(c)

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Based on a true story; a retelling of the negotiations that took place against the backdrop of the Oslo Peace Accords in the 1990s between the Palestinian Liberation Organization and the government of Israel in which Norway acted as an intermediary.(c)

programme.title: Adventures of a Mathematician
programme.desc: Based on a true story; in the 1930s, Stan Ulam, a Polish-born mathematician, travels to the United States, where he joins the Manhattan Project and helps create the first computer.(c)

programme.title: All My Life
programme.desc: When Solomon meets Jennifer sparks fly and they fall head over heels in love. As they decide to get married, their wedding plans are disrupted when they find out that Solomon has liver cancer.(n)

programme.title: After The Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Charlie's Angels always provided their investigative skills to their clients. Now Townsend Agency has highly trained women from around the world who work on the most challenging missions. When a systems engineer reveals information about dangerous technology, the angels must face this threat.(n)

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Trapped in a retirement home, a group of former veterans seeks to put their skills to use to break out of their unwanted place of retirement, hoping to achieve the unrealized dreams that each of them still has.(n)

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.(n)

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: The adventures of Han Solo and Chewbacca before joining the Rebellion and their encounters with the famous gambler Lando Calrissian, in a journey that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.(n)

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.(n)

programme.title: Bad Tales
programme.desc: In this cinematic oeuvre, the film follows the lives of several families residing in the suburban part of Rome, seemingly in an affectionate peace, but eventually, everything crumbles down because of their children. A sweet parable of innocence, morality, and mutual influence.(n)

programme.title: Hell on the Border
programme.desc: The true story of how Bass Reeves beat the odds and a racist community to become the first black deputy marshal west of the Mississippi River, with a career that made history as he distinguished himself in facing off against the outlaws.(n)

programme.title: At the Heart of Gold: Inside the USA Gymnastics Scandal
programme.desc: The film depicts the scandal revolving USA Gymnastics National Team, doctor Larry Nassar, who had been abusing young athletes for decades.(n)

programme.title: Rome in Love
programme.desc: With her dreams of being an actress about to come true, Amelia needs to keep the news of her casting as the lead in the remake of Roman Holiday under wraps. But once she meets a journalist tasked with writing about the mysterious new lead of the movie, all bets are off as romance comes knocking.(n)

programme.title: Let Him Go
programme.desc: The life of a retired sheriff and his wife takes a tragic turn when their only son passes away. Grief-stricken and unable to shake off their sense of loss, they set out on a journey to find their grandson.(n)

programme.title: Love in Design
programme.desc: With the ratings for her home renovation TV show in decline, Hannah is robbed into returning to her hometown to take on a new job that will take her show in a new restoring a historical manor. Assigned to oversee her work is architect Jeff, who just happens to be her ex-boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: In the Key of Love
programme.desc: After walking away from her former life to take over her grandmother's wedding photography business, the past comes calling for Maggie when she is hired for the wedding of her ex-boyfriend's sister. It turns out that there is still a spark between the two, just waiting to be reignited.(n)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: The story of a young Chinese girl who disguises herself as a male warrior in order to save her father. A journey that sends her into several challenges and threats, urging her to save not only her father but also the honor of her nation.(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Charlie's Angels always provided their investigative skills to their clients. Now Townsend Agency has highly trained women from around the world who work on the most challenging missions. When a systems engineer reveals information about dangerous technology, the angels must face this threat.(n)

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: When a late-night talk-show host is in danger of losing her job, she hires a new woman writer, Molly, to join her only-male writing team. Molly's determination to prove her talent in a male-dominant environment has unexpected results on both Katherine's career and personal life.(n)

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.(n)

programme.title: Black Widow
programme.desc: Set after the Avengers' Civil War but before the war with Thanos, Natasha Romanoff goes on a new mission in Russia, which stirs up her past with the KGB, her training by the Red Room, and her journey to becoming the hero known as the Black Widow.(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: Now a police inspector, Marcus Burnett teams up with Mike Lowery as they face off against a pair of drug lords, who are, in fact, a mother and a son, all while previous vendettas are chasing them.(n)

programme.title: Replicas
programme.desc: A daring synthetic biologist, having lost his family in a car accident, will stop at nothing to bring them back, even if it means going up against a government-controlled laboratory and the physical laws of science.(n)

programme.title: Holly Slept Over
programme.desc: As a married couple struggles with their inability to conceive, their marriage seems to go downhill when an old college friend shows up and stays over at their place for the weekend.(n)

programme.title: Monster Party
programme.desc: As three thieves plot to infiltrate a party for a daring heist, it soon unfolds that the guests are anything but innocent, and now they have to fight for their lives.(n)

programme.title: Relish
programme.desc: A private treatment facility unites a group of troubled teenagers as they plan an escape to attend a music festival, an endeavor that sees a bond growing between them as they embark on an unexpected adventure.(n)

programme.desc: The story revolves around Olive, who lives in a New England town, where crime and illegal acts are rampant. programme.title: Before I Go to Sleep
programme.desc: Christine Lucas, a forty-year-old woman, wakes up every day and never remembers what happened the day before as a result of a trauma that occurred after a car accident 10 years ago, leading to brain damage. One day terrifying facts begin to emerge, which makes Christine try to look for explanations, and answers from all those around her, especially after consulting with the doctor (Nash) who tries to help her.

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: The film tells of a suspicious video of some strange scenes, after the viewer sees it, he gets a phone call telling him that he will die after 7 days.

programme.title: House At The End Of The Street
programme.desc: After her parents separate, Elissa moves with her mother to their dream house in the country. But the dream is disturbed when they learn that the house at the end of their street was the scene of a violent crime where a girl killed her parents.

programme.title: Campfire Kiss
programme.desc: Dana's attempt to bond with her teenage son by taking him camping takes a turn when she clashes with the man in the cabin next to them, himself a father trying to reconnect with his daughter. But the conflict soon turns into romance as sparks fly between the two single parents.

A childhood friend, who harbors a secret crush on her, steps up as a replacement groom to help her save face.

programme.title: You Again
programme.desc: Marni is a successful businesswoman who returns to her hometown for the marriage of her older brother. She finds that he's about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school. Things get worse when Marni's mother comes face-to-face with the girl's aunt, who was also bothering her in high school.

programme.title: Dead Over Diamonds: Picture Perfect Mysteries
programme.desc: When a diamond necklace is stolen, Det. Sam enlists the help of the photographer Allie to find it. The last thing they expect during their investigation is for it to point them straight to an unexpected death.

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: A new student must find someone to date the most depressing girl in school, in order to take her little sister, who he likes, on a date, who's not allowed to date anyone till her older sister is on a date first.

programme.title: Fair Game
programme.desc: CIA operative Valerie Plame is tracking a uranium deal that is rumored that Iraq will buy it from Niger, but the war in Niger erupts, and the US war on Iraq starts anyway. Her opposition husband Joe Wilson writes an article exposing the lie of the US administration, and the authorities avenge him.(c)

programme.desc: A photographer becomes obsessed with a mysterious man after a woman becomes missing, which leads him down a horrific path.(c)

programme.desc: When she wakes up on her 10th anniversary and finds herself in Hawaii, things rapidly escalate for Liz as she finds her husband dead while she is accused of murdering him. She sets out to prove herself innocent by finding the true culprit.(c)
